biz.gabrys.lesscss.extended.compiler.source

Interface ConcreteSourceFactory<T extends LessSource>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - created instances type.
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractUriSourceFactory, ClasspathSourceFactory, FtpSourceFactory, HttpSourceFactory, LocalSourceFactory

    public interface ConcreteSourceFactory<T extends LessSource>
    Responsible for creating new instances of the LessSource with the particular type.
    Since:
    1.0

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      T createAbsoluteSource(LessSource source, String importAbsolutePath)
      Creates a LessSource based on the absolute path to imported source.
      T createRelativeSource(LessSource source, String importRelativePath)
      Creates a LessSource based on the LessSource and relative path to imported source.
      boolean isAbsolutePath(String path)
      Checks whether the path represents an absolute path.

    • Method Detail

      • createAbsoluteSource

        T createAbsoluteSource(LessSource source,
                       String importAbsolutePath)
        Creates a LessSource based on the absolute path to imported source.
        Parameters:
        source - the LessSource which contains import.
        importAbsolutePath - the absolute path of the imported path.
        Returns:
        the new instance of the LessSource.
        Since:
        1.0

      • createRelativeSource

        T createRelativeSource(LessSource source,
                       String importRelativePath)
        Creates a LessSource based on the LessSource and relative path to imported source.
        Parameters:
        source - the LessSource which contains import.
        importRelativePath - the relative path of the imported path.
        Returns:
        the new instance of the LessSource.
        Since:
        1.0

      • isAbsolutePath

        boolean isAbsolutePath(String path)
        Checks whether the path represents an absolute path.
        Parameters:
        path - the checked path.
        Returns:
        true whether the path represents an absolute path, otherwise false.
        Since:
        1.0
